fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
head_office_address: Arriva plc Lacon House, 6th floor 84 Theobalds Road
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EPTO is the association of European Passenger Transport Operators and represents the leading transport services organisations in Europe, whose members are presently the seven largest public transport companies in Europe: Arriva, First Group, Go-Ahead, Grupo Barraqueiro, Keolis, National Express and Stagecoach. Members cover 28 countries (of which 18 EU) and carry 10 Billion Passengers p.a.
